data.title: Wild Mountain Thyme (2020)
data.meta_description: Financial analysis of Wild Mountain Thyme (2020) including budget, domestic and international box office gross, DVD and Blu-ray sales reports, total earnings and profitability.
data.text:
Synopsis

The headstrong farmer Rosemary Muldoon has her heart set on winning her neighbor Anthony Reilly’s love. The problem is Anthony seems to have inherited a family curse, and remains oblivious to his beautiful admirer. Stung by his father Tony’s plans to sell the family farm to his American nephew, Anthony is jolted into pursuing his dreams in this comedic, moving and wildly romantic tale.

Metrics
